content:
Diagnosis:
Clear cell renal cell carcinoma, right kidney
T2bN0M0 at diagnosis March 2024

Previous medical history:
Hypertension
Type 2 diabetes

Current medications:
Metformin 1g bd
Ramipril 5mg od
Pazopanib 800mg od

Allergies:
None known

Current situation:
Cycle 3 pazopanib review

CT scan 15 May 2024 shows 30% reduction in primary tumor size from 9.2cm to 6.4cm

Blood pressure well controlled on home monitoring

Liver function tests stable

I reviewed [redacted name] today for assessment during cycle 3 pazopanib. Treatment has been well tolerated with only grade 1 fatigue and mild diarrhea managed with loperamide as needed. Performance status remains 0. Recent CT shows good partial response with 30% reduction in the primary tumor size. Blood pressure has remained stable on home monitoring with readings consistently below 140/90. Liver function tests are stable and thyroid function remains normal.

The plan is to continue pazopanib at full dose with review in 6 weeks. We will arrange repeat CT at that point to confirm ongoing response. [redacted name] understands to contact us if any problems develop in the interim, particularly regarding blood pressure or new side effects.

cancer_timeline.value: CT scan shows 30% reduction in primary tumor size from 9.2cm to 6.4cm

patient_facts.value: Liver function tests stable and thyroid function normal

status_updates.value: Localized right kidney cancer showing good response to pazopanib with 30% reduction in primary tumor size. Treatment well tolerated with minimal side effects.
30% reduction in primary tumor size from 9.2cm to 6.4cm on CT
Grade 1 fatigue and mild diarrhea managed with loperamide
Continuing pazopanib at full dose 800mg daily
Review in clinic in 6 weeks with CT results
